pr_title: Close AuditLog while closing OpenDistroSecurityPlugin and unregister shutdown hook when closing AuditLogImpl.

timeline.message: Close AuditLog while closing OpenDistroSecurityPlugin and unregister shutdown hook when closing AuditLogImpl.

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be this.close() instead of messageRouter.close() ?
timeline.author: dinusX

replies.bodyText: We can't call this.close() from the shutdown hook as it calls removeShutdownHook() while shutdown is in process.
replies.author: vrozov
